sourcesContent: import "../../main.css" function Spinner({ size = "md", variant = "primary", label = "Loading…" }) { const sizePx = size === "large" ? 60 : size === "small" ? 24 : 38 const getStrokeColor = () => { switch (variant) { case "primary": return "var(--accent-color)" case "secondary": return "var(--default-color)" case "danger": return "#dc3545" case "gray": return "color-mix(in srgb, var(--default-color), transparent 50%)" default: return "var(--accent-color)" } } return ( {label} ) } export default Spinner
